feed.title: GitHub Apex Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Apex in GitHub

entry.title: khushal-ganani/todo-google-tasks-integration
entry.summary: Salesforce To-Do Manager with Google Tasks Integration project which extends the capabilities of the original To-Do Manager by seamlessly integrating with the Google Tasks API. The project includes secure OAuth 2.0 authorization, robust JSON parsing, Postman testing, and Apex callouts with trigger handlers.
